programmes.show_description: In the face of oncoming traffic, Wagga Truck Towing has to remove a heavily laden rolled B-Double that's shut down a major highway.
Reality series. With Todd and his rival Darrell on the same route, will they manage to keep things professional? Polar boss Mark throws a newbie in at the deep end.
On the M25 near Enfield two lorries, two cars and a van have piled into each other, blocking three lanes. In a ten-mile tailback the Lantern team must recover the two artics.
A 40-tonne lorry careers off the M1 and plunges down an embankment, becoming embedded in a ditch. Steve needs to work out how to free the truck, preventing it from falling on its side.
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Teleshopping.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Dormeo - the home of a great night's sleep.
Shop JML, the home for clever ideas.
Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your greatest one!
The cops deal with a major drugs bust, a man linked to an alleged assault on a woman, and a gang of suspected poachers with an un-taxed van.
This episode hits the ground running as the interceptors pull over a driver, who casually steps out of the car, before taking off like a shot.
Armed police respond to reports of a fight involving machetes. Plus, cops provide a dawn chorus (aka raid).
Old-style western about three drifters whose dreams of going to California are shattered in a New Mexico village where one of them is killed in a shoot-out with the local gang.
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Old-style western about three drifters whose dreams of going to California are shattered in a New Mexico village where one of them is killed in a shoot-out with the local gang.
Western starring John Wayne and Martha Scott, about an oilman locked in a feud with his bitter rival. (1943)
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Western starring John Wayne and Martha Scott, about an oilman locked in a feud with his bitter rival. (1943)
Dave must haul a 68-tonne transformer through the back roads of Suffolk, avoiding weaker bridges and tackling narrow countryside roads. Smurf faces delays during a time-sensitive job.
Over a Bank Holiday, near Scarborough, a high-speed pursuit ensues after a driver fails to stop. In the Dales, an operation is underway to crack down on motorists flouting the law.
Dog handler Darren calls on all his powers of persuasion to try and end a rooftop stand-off, and Steve is forced to use his pepper spray on a suspect.
Paul takes the lead in a dangerous high-speed pursuit through the streets of Stockton, and Spike hunts down a suspect Skoda.
A shocking hit and run leaves an elderly driver with serious head injuries, and a rude driver's outburst brings him under scrutiny which he could live to regret.
Humber Bridge staff alert police to a car that has just passed through stinking of cannabis. And in Grimsby, a dog unit chases a car that fails to stop.
Victims are terrorised in their home by a knife-wielding intruder, twice in 24 hours. The race is on for police to catch the hardened criminal and his accomplice before another strike.
American Matthew VanDyke returns to Libya to help rebel friends fight against Qaddafi forces, but he's captured and held in solitary confinement for nearly six months.
Clayton's towing is under pressure to salvage a washed up yacht without it falling apart on a pristine Queensland beach.
Reality series. Ice road rookie Mike attempts his first solo delivery; Polar's top dog Todd Dewey runs into trouble and truck problems slow Art's season to a halt.
On the M11, a fully loaded truck pulling an extra trailer has been left marooned after a rear axle collapsed while at full speed. Alpha recovery deal with a motorhome gutted by fire.
In Northumberland, a 32-tonne tipper gets lost in the dark and ends up stuck in a boggy field, while in Leicester recovery op Zibby gets the keys to a brand-new set of wheels.

Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your greatest one!
Over a Bank Holiday, near Scarborough, a high-speed pursuit ensues after a driver fails to stop. In the Dales, an operation is underway to crack down on motorists flouting the law.
Police enter a 'house of horrors' seeking a man on the run. Plus, an epic 45-mile pursuit.
Doors get smashed in dawn raids on drug dealers, shots are fired in a suburban siege, and bad guys are chased at more than 100mph.
Western starring Glenn Ford and Ida Lupino. A young man searches for a lost Arizona gold mine, discovered by his greedy grandfather back in the 1800s. (1949)

Western starring Glenn Ford and Ida Lupino. A young man searches for a lost Arizona gold mine, discovered by his greedy grandfather back in the 1800s. (1949)
Western starring John Wayne. A group of people travelling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process. (1939)
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Western starring John Wayne. A group of people travelling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process. (1939)
Moving a top heavy five-metre tall tram carefully through the streets of Blackpool, and collecting a fire engine from Deeside and driving it over to Cleveland in Teeside.
With North Yorkshire's roads a big draw for bikers, policing them is a top priority. A 70-year-old biker crashes down an embankment but is spared serious injury thanks to a gadget.
Jacko is hot on the heels of a speeding Mazda, while the interceptors raid a cannabis farm. Canine cop Shadow sniffs out stolen goods.
Liam and police dog Titan are tracking suspects. Damo finds a man unconscious and a suspicious driver tries to outfox the interceptors.
Cops spot a car speeding by the Tyne, and when they pull it over, a search uncovers a crack pipe. And PC Martain Anderson stakes out a suspected drug driver.
An unlicensed driver flees police, sparking a pursuit involving a firearms team and a chopper. Officers find out there's more to this than just a driver who hasn't passed his test.
With Gambia in the midst of a coup, a select group of British Special Forces are sent in to covertly rescue the absent President's wife and children. (Ep3/3)
When a drug dealer infiltrates a biker gang for a million-dollar payout, he's pulled into a horrific murder hit. Facing life behind bars, he has no choice but to go undercover.
